Title: The Quest for the Lost Kingdom

Village.Body: You are in a small village surrounded by lush forests. The village is peaceful but rumors of an ancient kingdom have been circulating.

Forest.Body: You venture into the forest. The trees are tall and the light is dim. You feel a sense of adventure in the air.

Tavern.Body: You enter the tavern. It's bustling with travelers and merchants. You hear interesting stories from all around the world.

Choices.Text: Talk to the old man in the corner

Deep Forest.Body: You find yourself deep in the forest. The air is cooler and you hear the sound of a nearby stream.

Old Man.Body: The old man tells you about the legend of a lost kingdom hidden deep in the forest. He suggests you follow a stream in the forest.

Choices.Text: Thank him and leave the tavern

Hidden Cave.Body: You follow the stream and discover a hidden cave entrance. It's dark and mysterious.

Choices.Text: Go back to the Deep Forest

Lost Kingdom.Body: You enter the cave and discover the lost kingdom! The walls are adorned with ancient carvings and the air is filled with magic. You notice a locked door leading to what seems like the Royal Chamber. It is adorned with intricate patterns, but you can't open it without a key.

Choices.Text: Unlock the door to the Royal Chamber

Riverbank.Body: You arrive at the riverbank. The water is calm and serene. There are several fishing boats docked along the edge.

Fisherman.Body: The fisherman tells you of a legend about a mystical fish that grants wishes. He suggests you explore the river.

Old Ruins.Body: You find yourself in front of ancient ruins. The architecture is crumbling but hints at the grandeur it once had. As you explore the ruins, you stumble upon an 'Ancient Key' lying on the ground. You decide to take it with you.

Search Ruins.Body: You search the ruins and find an old scroll with inscriptions about the lost kingdom.

Mystical Tree.Body: You stumble upon a mystical tree with glowing leaves. The tree whispers ancient secrets and reveals hidden paths.

Bard.Body: The bard tells stories of heroes and adventurers who discovered treasures and secrets. His tales inspire you to continue your quest.

Choices.Text: Thank the bard and leave the tavern

Magic Pond.Body: You arrive at the Magic Pond, a serene and enchanting body of water surrounded by willow trees. The water shimmers with an otherworldly glow, and you notice a glowing fish swimming near the edge.

Glowing Fish Interaction.Body: You approach the glowing fish. It looks at you with curious eyes and offers you a chance to make a wish. What will you wish for?

Wish Wealth.Body: The glowing fish grants your wish for wealth. You suddenly find a treasure chest filled with gold and jewels!

Wish Knowledge.Body: The glowing fish grants your wish for knowledge. You suddenly gain insight into the history of the lost kingdom and the path to find it!

Wish Peace.Body: The glowing fish grants your wish for peace. You feel a profound sense of calm and tranquility wash over you.

Royal Chamber.Body: You unlock the door and enter the Royal Chamber. The room is vast and filled with treasures and relics of the ancient kingdom. You've found the heart of the lost kingdom!
